snippet: With four games remaining for each team, any combination of Atlanta Hawks victories or Knicks losses totaling two would end the Knicks’ chance at the postseason.
abstract: New York Knicks postseason hopes are dwindling fast as the end of 2014 regular season closes in; any combination of Atlanta Hawks victories or Knicks losses totaling two would clinch the eighth and final seed in the Eastern Conference for the Hawks, who have four games left in the regular season.
lead_paragraph: With four games remaining for each team, any combination of Atlanta Hawks victories or Knicks losses totaling two would end the Knicks’ chance at the postseason.

headline.main: Injury and Math Dim Hopes for Knicks
headline.print_headline: Injury and Math Dim Hopes for Knicks
